import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../AdagyLanding.css'; const AdagyLanding = () => { const [isReduced, setIsReduced] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setIsReduced((prev) => !prev); }, 3000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); return (
Features About FAQ Contact Us

{isReduced ? 'Reduce' : 'Increase'} Robot {isReduced ? 'Downtime' : 'Uptime'}

24/7 remote intervention for autonomous systems

Book a Demo
A team from world class institutions

The Cost of Robot Downtime

The global cost of robot downtime is staggering, impacting productivity and profitability. Don't let your robots sit idle. Adagy Robotics offers a reliable solution to keep your operations running smoothly.

We Rescue Robots.

Adagy Robotics is a 24/7 remote intervention service for your robots. When your robot fails, it can call out to Adagy over our API. Our trained operators will take over and drive your robot back to a stable state, and then resume autonomous operation.

Adagy is a 24/7 call center for robots

For when your robot runs into a problem it doesn't know how to solve (yet).

Trained Robot Teleoperators

Auditable Activity Logs

IT Compliance

Real-Time Notifications to On-Site Operators

Proactive Repeat Failure Alerts

Easy-to-Integrate API

Offer Your Customers the Reliability Solution They Deserve
